entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • XSLTs are not possible in NativeAOT #84389
  • Seeing HTTP Client timeout issue after upgrading to dotnet core 6.0 #84388
  • Disable JsonSerializer.IsReflectionEnabledByDefault on `PublishTrimmed=true` #84378
    8.0.0
  • Unsafe.As doesn't update type information in JIT #84377
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator Does Not Seem to Work With .NET Framework 4.8 #84376
  • Extend `Utf8JsonReader.CopyString` to also accept `JsonTokenType.Number` values #84375
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Optimize the access pattern to threadstatics. #84373
  • How to publish an app using daily runtime packages? #84372
  • Changing TargetName in csproj breaks app host #84371
  • Wasm.Build.Tests.Blazor.MiscTests.DefaultTemplate_AOT_InProjectFile Test failed #84368
    8.0.0
  • WASM DebuggerTests.BreakpointTests.DebuggerTests.BreakpointTests.JSConditionalBreakpoint Failure #84367
  • Timeouts in Socket tests on Debian.*.Arm32.Open #84364
    8.0.0
  • "System.Console.Clear()" does not clear the scroll buffer on Linux. #84351
  • [API Proposal]: Decouple ValidateOnStart from Hosting #84347
    8.0.0
  • self-contained publish app crashes with missing files after update .net7.0.3 -> 7.0.4 #84346
  • Directory.Delete(string, bool) throws StackOverflowException #84344
  • [6.0] tvOS arm64 build graph failure: project file not loaded System.Composition.AttributedModel.csproj #84334
    6.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: `MethodImplOptions.Cold` for marking cold methods for the JIT #84333

Closed

  • JSON source generator crawling never picks up a property #84190
  • Add an AppContext switch that disables using reflection by default in JsonSerializerOptions #83279
    8.0.0
  • Avoid duplicate cmp instruction, avoid boolean zero extension #70003
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ToArray and ToList overloads with length argument #83807
  • Deadlock when using TryStartNoGCRegion and/or GC.Collect #84096
    8.0.0
  • Authentication failed when trying to connect to secure websocket with android 8 #83118
  • WASM windows AOT: Timeout compiling native assets with emcc with -Oz #84362
  • [API Proposal]: Dictionary.TrySetValue #83920

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Implement LEAVE_CHECK in the jiterpreter (as a bailout) #84387
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix Ordinal Ignore Case string compare #84386
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Globalization, 6.0.x
  • [mono][aot] Fix an assert. #84385
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Obsolete most of the remaining legacy serialization APIs #84383
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Disable nullability checks in file shared between the managed type system and ILVerificationTests #84382
    area-Tools-ILVerification
  • Simplify target to enable config binding src generator and rename enabling property #84379
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Fixes for BuildAsStandalone in tests #84374
    test-bug, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Improve regex compiler / source generator for sets #84370
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Reduce the trim requirements on MetadataUpdateHandlerAttribute #84369
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix Roslyn dependency version in source-build #84366
    blocking, area-Infrastructure, partner-impact
  • Enable building preview workload components #84365
    needs-area-label
  • [release/7.0-staging] Add linker flags to add fixup data to PDBs (#58417) #84358
    needs-area-label
  • [release/6.0] Fix pinned assembly version 6.0 #84357
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Fix pinned assembly version 7.0 #84355
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Set GTF_DEBUG_NODE_MORPHED properly in block morph #84352
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64: Optimize pairs of "str wzr" to "str xzr" #84350
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Avoid unnecessary GTF_GLOB_REFs #84349
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable AVX-512 in Memmove unrolling #84348
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Adding support for Vector128::ExtractMostSignificantBits intrinsic on ARM64 with miniJIT #84345
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [6.0] Reset OOB packages from 6.0.16 #84342
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • [7.0] Reset OOB packages from 7.0.5 #84341
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • [CI][Android] Show disk usage before build #84340
    needs-area-label
  • Added the ability to specify a Spin Count Unit via a GC Configuration #84339
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Move startup hook tests targeting `StartupHookProvider` out of hosting tests #84338
    area-Host
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #84337
    area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #84336
    area-codeflow
  • Use a tuned ConcurrentDictionary in the default caching implementation for the COM source generator #84335
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Speed up named type lookups in managed type system #84285
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Android] Free up more disk space on CI builds #84354
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add missing step to native AOT dev workflow instructions #84381
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [PERF] Removed pipeline dependencies and steps for running Maui-iOS #84363
    area-Infrastructure
  • Avoid scaning the used region if there are no free units #81525
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Implement the JsonSerializer.IsReflectionEnabledByDefault feature switch #83844
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] X86/X64 - Eliminate redundant 'cmp' instructions #82750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [MONO][MARSHAL] Initialize ilgen with a flag #83813
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.6
  • [wasm][debugger] Retry after timeout on debugger tests on CI #84080
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2151332 #84276
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Caching settings.pause_mode to avoid deadlock #84189
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Fix an assert in the aot compiler. #84343
  • Switch CustomAttributeTypeNameParser to use common type name parser #84281
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid clearing uncommitted mark array #83623
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Ensure tail merging does not add preds to scratch block #84353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Freeze the emscripten cache #84356
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Implement the ENDFINALLY opcode in the jiterpreter #84273
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Simd refactoring #84170
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix encoding problem when publishing #83577
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.x
  • Enabled Sqrt and Abs intrinsics #84011
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Update branding to 6.0.17 #84315
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 7.0.6 #84316
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [6.0] Add check-service-labels.yml to unblock base branch PRs #84332
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [7.0] Add check-service-labels.yml to unblock base branch PRs #84331
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • NativeAOT: Partially expand static initialization #83911
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduction to vectorization with Vector128 and Vector256 #84115
    area-Meta
  • Always create loop pre headers #83956
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement proper parsing for primitives in config binding gen #84154
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Use dn_vector_t instead of GArray in a few places #84027
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Adding support for Vector512 `Equals`, `EqualsAny`, `op_Equality`, and `op_Inequality`. #83470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Add Utf8.TryWrite #83852
    area-System.Text.Encoding, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Don't overwrite pinned assembly versions in servicing #84079
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [JIT] Add support to inline the field access of primitive types marked with TLS #82973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Use Span.CopyTo(Span) in BigInteger's add and subtract #83951
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm-mt] Allow JSImport promises to run on managed threadpool worker threads #83838
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Use better trimming message in ValidationContext #84326
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations
  • [Mono] Enable the supported V128 SIMD intrinsics on Arm64 across all codegen engines #84289
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Introducing Time abstraction Part2 (down-level support) #84235
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Populating JSON properties support #83669
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add ArgumentOutOfRangeException.ThrowIf{Not}Equal #83853
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #84082
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Make WindowsServiceLifetime gracefully stop #83892
    area-System.ServiceProcess
  • Add HttpClient.Shared #84327
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Add status code and exception info to System.Net.Http events #84036
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Add back IComparable-based optimization to FrozenDictionary/Set #84301
    area-System.Collections
  • Fix BeginReceiveMessageFromV4BoundToSpecificV6_NotReceived #83463
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [browser] Blazor.boot.json integration #84296
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Seed stress modes by string hash #83771
    blocked, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-jit directory #82379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Add vectorization to improve CRC32 performance #83321
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • JIT: Always look for SIMD fields during promotion #84122
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, area-codeflow
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` compare #84249
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [test] Try to get more details from hanging build #84253
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Enable deduplication of runtime invoke wrappers #84304
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • Use cinc instead of csel when possible #82031
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • More efficient executable allocator #83632
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix reserving executable memory as per allocation type in ClrVirtualAllocWithinRange() #83958
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.6
  • JIT: Add a (disabled) prototype for a generalized promotion pass #83388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reenable VectorLookup tests for mono. #84330
  • Correctly display the GCSettings specified in the runtimeconfig json via the GC Configuration API Call #84201
    area-GC-coreclr
